info.title: User-Data Consents Management Blockchain
info.description: User consents management using Blockchain technology to guarantee integrity and traceability of private data.

ChainConsentsDetailedResponse.title: ChainConsentsDetailedResponse
ChainConsentsDetailedResponse.description: Detailed representation when query parameter requests it.

updated.title: Updated
updated.description: Last moment the chain was updated by consensus resolution.

action.description: Action represented by this consent definition.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: Indicates if consent is given by data owner.

type.description: Details the last modification type that defined this consent definition.

expire.title: Expire
expire.description: Moment when the consent should be considered expired. Revert back automatically to revoked consent when datetime is reached. Consents never expire if unspecified, unless explicitly updated with revoked consent.

total.title: Total
total.description: Amount of nodes that can participate in consensus resolution.

updated.title: Updated
updated.description: Last moment the chain was updated by consensus resolution.

resolved.title: Resolved
resolved.description: Indicates if any update was applied following resolution.

validated.title: Validated
validated.description: Indicates if any other node was available for consensus.

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.description: Nodes that participated in validation of consensus resolution.

chain.title: Chain
chain.description: Blocks that form the resolved chain.

message.title: Message
message.description: Result of the new consent block.

index.title: Index
index.description: Index of the new block in the chain.

consents.title: Consents
consents.description: Consents applied within the new block.

proof.title: Proof
proof.description: Proof of work associated to the block.

previous_hash.title: Previous Hash
previous_hash.description: Hash of the previous block in the chain.
